volume_set_of_liouville:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- The set of Liouville numbers has Lebesgue measure zero. -/
@[simp]
theorem volume_set_of_liouville : volume { x : exprℝ | liouville x } = 0 := by
  simpa only [ae_iff, not_not] using ae_not_liouville
#align volume_set_of_liouville volume_set_of_liouville
volume_Union_set_of_liouville_with:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nnreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nnreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- The set of numbers satisfying the Liouville condition with some exponent `p > 2` has Lebesgue
measure zero. -/
@[simp]
theorem volume_Union_set_of_liouville_with :
    volume
        («expr⋃ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , »"
          { x : exprℝ | liouville_with p x }) =
      0 :=
  by
  simp only [← set_of_exists]
  refine' measure_mono_null set_of_liouville_with_subset_aux _
  rw [measure_Union_null_iff]
  intro m
  rw [measure_preimage_add_right]
  clear m
  refine' (measure_bUnion_null_iff <| to_countable _).2 fun n (hn : 1 ≤ n) => _
  generalize hr : (2 + 1 / n : exprℝ) = r
  replace hr : 2 < r
  · simp [← hr, zero_lt_one.trans_le hn]
  clear hn n
  refine' measure_set_of_frequently_eq_zero _
  simp only [set_of_exists, ← real.dist_eq, ← mem_ball, set_of_mem_eq]
  set B : ℤ → ℕ → set (exprℝ) := fun a b => ball (a / b) (1 / b ^ r)
  have hB : ∀ a b, volume (B a b) = ↑(2 / b ^ r : nnreal) :=
    by
    intro a b
    rw [real.volume_ball, mul_one_div, ← nnreal.coe_two, ← nnreal.coe_nat_cast, ← nnreal.coe_rpow, ← nnreal.coe_div,
      ennreal.of_real_coe_nnreal]
  have :
    ∀ b : ℕ,
      volume («expr⋃ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , »" (B a b)) ≤
        (2 * (b ^ (1 - r) + b ^ (-r)) : nnreal) :=
    by
    intro b
    calc
      volume («expr⋃ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , »" (B a b)) ≤
          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum"
            (finset.Icc (0 : ℤ) b) (volume (B a b)) :=
        measure_bUnion_finset_le _ _
      _ = ((b + 1) * (2 / b ^ r) : nnreal) := by
        simp only [hB, int.card_Icc, finset.sum_const, nsmul_eq_mul, sub_zero, ← Int.ofNat_succ, Int.toNat_coe_nat, ←
          Nat.cast_succ, ennreal.coe_mul, ennreal.coe_nat]
      _ = _ := _
      
    have : 1 - r ≠ 0 := by linarith
    rw [ennreal.coe_eq_coe]
    simp [add_mul, div_eq_mul_inv, nnreal.rpow_neg, nnreal.rpow_sub' _ this, mul_add, mul_left_comm]
  refine' ne_top_of_le_ne_top (ennreal.tsum_coe_ne_top_iff_summable.2 _) (ennreal.tsum_le_tsum this)
  refine' (summable.add _ _).mul_left _ <;> simp only [nnreal.summable_rpow] <;> linarith
#align volume_Union_set_of_liouville_with volume_Union_set_of_liouville_with

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∃ᶠ in , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-

theorem set_of_liouville_with_subset_aux :
    { x : exprℝ | ∃ p > 2, liouville_with p x } ⊆
      «expr⋃ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , »"
        («expr ⁻¹' » (fun x : exprℝ => x + m)
          («expr⋃ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , »"
            { x : exprℝ |
              «expr∃ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∃ᶠ in , »"
                at_top (∃ a ∈ finset.Icc (0 : ℤ) b, |x - (a : ℤ) / b| < 1 / b ^ (2 + 1 / n : exprℝ)) })) :=
  by
  rintro x ⟨p, hp, hxp⟩
  rcases exists_nat_one_div_lt (sub_pos.2 hp) with ⟨n, hn⟩
  rw [lt_sub_iff_add_lt'] at hn
  suffices
    ∀ y : exprℝ,
      liouville_with p y →
        y ∈ Ico (0 : exprℝ) 1 →
          «expr∃ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∃ᶠ in , »" at_top
            (∃ a ∈ finset.Icc (0 : ℤ) b, |y - a / b| < 1 / b ^ (2 + 1 / (n + 1 : ℕ) : exprℝ))
    by
    simp only [mem_Union, mem_preimage]
    have hx : x + ↑(-«expr⌊ ⌋» x) ∈ Ico (0 : exprℝ) 1 := by
      simp only [Int.floor_le, Int.lt_floor_add_one, add_neg_lt_iff_le_add', zero_add, and_self_iff, mem_Ico,
        Int.cast_neg, le_add_neg_iff_add_le]
    refine' ⟨-«expr⌊ ⌋» x, n + 1, n.succ_pos, this _ (hxp.add_int _) hx⟩
  clear hxp x
  intro x hxp hx01
  refine' ((hxp.frequently_lt_rpow_neg hn).and_eventually (eventually_ge_at_top 1)).mono _
  rintro b ⟨⟨a, hne, hlt⟩, hb⟩
  rw [rpow_neg b.cast_nonneg, ← one_div, ← Nat.cast_succ] at hlt
  refine' ⟨a, _, hlt⟩
  replace hb : (1 : exprℝ) ≤ b
  exact nat.one_le_cast.2 hb
  have hb0 : (0 : exprℝ) < b := zero_lt_one.trans_le hb
  replace hlt : |x - a / b| < 1 / b
  · refine' hlt.trans_le (one_div_le_one_div_of_le hb0 _)
    calc
      (b : exprℝ) = b ^ (1 : exprℝ) := (rpow_one _).symm
      _ ≤ b ^ (2 + 1 / (n + 1 : ℕ) : exprℝ) := rpow_le_rpow_of_exponent_le hb (one_le_two.trans _)
      
    simpa using n.cast_add_one_pos.le
  rw [sub_div' _ _ _ hb0.ne', abs_div, abs_of_pos hb0, div_lt_div_right hb0, abs_sub_lt_iff, sub_lt_iff_lt_add,
    sub_lt_iff_lt_add, ← sub_lt_iff_lt_add'] at hlt
  rw [finset.mem_Icc, ← Int.lt_add_one_iff, ← Int.lt_add_one_iff, ← neg_lt_iff_pos_add, add_comm, ←
    @Int.cast_lt (exprℝ), ← @Int.cast_lt (exprℝ)]
  push_cast
  refine' ⟨lt_of_le_of_lt _ hlt.1, hlt.2.trans_le _⟩
  · simp only [mul_nonneg hx01.left b.cast_nonneg, neg_le_sub_iff_le_add, le_add_iff_nonneg_left]
  · rw [add_le_add_iff_left]
    calc
      x * b ≤ 1 * b := mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_right hx01.2.le hb0.le
      _ = b := one_mul b
      
#align set_of_liouville_with_subset_aux set_of_liouville_with_subset_aux
disjoint_residual_ae:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- The filters `residual ℝ` and `volume.ae` are disjoint. This means that there exists a residual
set of Lebesgue measure zero (e.g., the set of Liouville numbers). -/
theorem real.disjoint_residual_ae : Disjoint (residual (exprℝ)) volume.ae :=
  disjoint_of_disjoint_of_mem disjoint_compl_right eventually_residual_liouville ae_not_liouville
#align real.disjoint_residual_ae real.disjoint_residual_ae
ae_not_liouville_with:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem ae_not_liouville_with :
    «expr∀ᵐ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ , »"
      (∀ p > (2 : exprℝ), ¬liouville_with p x) :=
  by simpa only [ae_iff, not_forall, not_not, set_of_exists] using volume_Union_set_of_liouville_with
#align ae_not_liouville_with ae_not_liouville_with
ae_not_liouville:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ , » -/
theorem ae_not_liouville :
    «expr∀ᵐ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ , »" ¬liouville x :=
  ae_not_liouville_with.mono fun x h₁ h₂ => h₁ 3 (by norm_num) (h₂.liouville_with 3)
#align ae_not_liouville ae_not_liouville
